comment:
They both were flawed people... we are all flawed ..
BUT hopefully this whole story pushes to the front the IMPORTANCE of,"innocent until proven guilty, and stop this CIRCUS of media/court of public opinion destroying the justice system!!

Makes me wonder how many people have had their cases destroyed by newspapers, and media through all the years!

Like the OJ trial....Casey Anthony...and even the Chauvin trial... yes Chauvin may be guilty, but he had no fair trial!! That is horrible and dangerous precedent for the future!!
Especially once we notice that the defense witnesses, and jurors were effected by threats! Literally afraid for their own safety, their families, and their future!!! That is not justice. We cannot allow that to be made normal.

Similar to how before "discovery," Amber had the entire narrative and media on her side...that was terrfying!
